thread.title: Man Pops a Pimple On His Chin That’s So Big and Leaky, He Almost Pukes
thread.title_full: Man Pops a Pimple On His Chin That’s So Big and Leaky, He Almost Pukes

author: Barry K
title: Man Pops a Pimple On His Chin That’s So Big and Leaky, He Almost Pukes
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
For some sadistic reason that we haven’t really figured out yet, people on the Internet are super into watching other people on the Internet pop their disgusting blackheads, cysts, and other skin growths on camera. Call it pimple porn. The grosser the zit, the more the clicks, as we learned when we published our list of the 10 most satisfying pimple-popping videos of 2016 . So we know what we must do to placate the masses, and that’s serve up another repulsive clip of a guy squeezing the living daylights out of the massive pimple on his chin, wringing it so hard that he almost vomits while alarming amounts of blood and pus leak out. It’s vile. But you know you want to watch it. 
According to The Daily Mail , this guy already had a doctor cut open the same pimple 3 months ago for $280, but when the zit swelled again and the pain got to the point where he couldn’t even tilt his neck back without screaming, he decided to take matters into his own hands —for free. Naturally, he documented the stunt on LiveLeak, and now the rest of us get to enjoy (?) his suffering. If you don’t get any kicks out of watching all the pus, you’ll definitely love all the expletives he utters during the spontaneous surgery. In fact, here are the 10 most delightful lines: Advertisement
